text: The less - than - robust third - quarter results came amid renewed concern about the volatility of stock prices and the role of computer - aided program trading . Taken together , the worries prompted a broad sell - off of stocks . The number of stocks on the New York Stock Exchange that fell in price yesterday exceeded 1,000 , a key measure of underlying sentiment among technical analysts .
